name: conspicuity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being noticeable or easy to see : Most cyclists wear brightly colored shirts or jackets to enhance their conspicuity. We need to improve the conspicuity of pedestrians at night.
More examplesFewer examplesThe logo on the cyclists' jackets is designed in bright colours for conspicuity.They ought to reassess the conspicuity of the road signs in this area.There was no statistical difference in conspicuity between the two viewing angles for examining the tumours.
